pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Sleep Roll On Essential Oil 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sleep Assist with Sweet Orange, Lavender, Marjoram & German Chamomile essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to soothe and aid in sleep.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Application to skin may cause sensitivity to sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.
Not to be taken.
Not to be used neat.
Store below 30°C.
Do not use if seal is around lid is damaged.

Common Uses

The powerful calming properties of Sweet Orange, Lavender, Marjoram and German Chamomile essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to assist with the relief of mild insomnia, sleeplessness and the symptoms associated with nervous tension, restlessness, stress, and mild anxiety to help provide a restful night's sleep.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL contains:
Citrus sinensis (Sweet Orange Oil) Fruit peel 43.54µL, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender Oil)  Herb top flowering 21µL, Origanum majorana (Sweet Marjoram Oil) Leaves 4.90µL, Matricaria chamomilla (German Chamomile Oil) Flowers .56µL, Grape Seed Oil 625µL, Prunis dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil) 300µL, Covi-ox T-70 (Natural Vitamin E) 5µL.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day)
